organisation_name: Institute of Biomedical Laboratory Science-Laboratory Medicine (IBMLS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Institute of Biomedical Laboratory Science-Laboratory Medicine is a biomedical laboratory science professional association in the EU/UK. Its main aims are to educate and represent its members, promote Biomedical Laboratory Science to the public, enable career development and award qualifications to its members.
